title: Gearty Grilling: Mukulika Banerjee on Indian Democracy
itunes:author: Mukulika Banerjee
description: Contributor(s): Mukulika Banerjee | Mukulika Banerjee, Reader in Social Anthropology, discusses democracy in India and why the act of voting is so meaningful for the majority of the population.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Mukulika Banerjee | Mukulika Banerjee, Reader in Social Anthropology, discusses democracy in India and why the act of voting is so meaningful for the majority of the population.
